English.Text: You receive no answer. Looking at your message again, it does seem a little abruptâ€” "STOP IN THE NAME OF SIR ARCHIBALD." You pursue at great distance towards Trelawney, southernmost point of the Old World, where not fifteen years previous, a great naval victory was won over La Corona by the heroic Admiral Nadasky. The Lap of Victory slows to a halt, and the Queen receives you rather icily aboard. With a gulp, you are finally able to ask why it is she has run away.
